body: Eirin joining in would be kinda weird, since she's married by this point (the dude seen with her is the protagonist from the P-Cup Eirin series). At least we get to see one of the quintuplets she gave birth to.

Huh… this was… a surprise, to be sure. So, does that mean that the last three parts are connected to Eirin’story… but Kasen’s revealed that is was just a doujin, so what is the canon? 

Anyways, here’s a small review:
Art: 4/5. Not his best but not his worst.
Story: 3/5. Might change if we get a translation but not very well detailed.
Characters: Waiting for a translation.
Overall: 7/10

Nice chapter and didn’t expect to see Eirin but the continuation of this NTR scenario has kinda worn me out. Hope things can change later!
I hope the author includes Eirin in the next  chapter
I hope the author does not include NTR with the doctor in the next chapter.
Damn didn't expect a 4th chapter. Cool

I was wondering who that other female was... this is missing 'Eirin Yagokoro' tag, even if it's just a cameo. She also had a cameo in the first part as well as the doctor. I hope Diisuke continue this series and have Eirin join in the fray! Man, I'm loving this series so far, thicc and juicy, clean designs, some of my favorite sex positions are used. Awesome. Can't wait for the TL let's goooooooo-
